product_name: CocoHydro Coconut Water Electrolyte Drink - Single Serving
long_description: Nothing beats fresh coconut water, but who can carry around a bundle of coconuts? Enjoy the next best thing with the COCO HYDRO(R) Coconut Water electrolyte drink. COCO HYDRO is rich in electrolytes, including potassium, calcium, sodium, manganese and magnesium. Simply add the packet of COCO HYDRO to 16 fl. oz. of water, shake it up and drink it down. Choose your favorite flavor-Original or Pineapple. COCO HYDRO Coconut Water electrolyte drink is certified vegan and gluten free. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Nothing beats fresh coconut water, but who can carry around a bundle of coconuts? Enjoy the next best thing with the COCO HYDRO(R) Coconut Water electrolyte drink.
